items.title: Report: OpenAI is buying AI-powered developer platform Windsurf — what happens to its support for rival LLMs?
items.description: OpenAI could see which types of developers use rival models such as the Meta Llama variants and Anthropic's Claude, and for what purposes.

items.title: Korl launches platform orchestrating AI agents from OpenAI, Gemini and Anthropic to hyper-customize customer messaging
items.description: Korl's platform works across multiple systems, using multi-agent and multimodal AI to create highly-customized customer messaging.

items.title: Ōura adds AI-driven meal and glucose tracking features with Stelo by Dexcom
items.description: Ōura, maker of a health-monitoring smart ring, announced that it will use AI to track and analyze two new metabolic health features: meals and glucose...

items.title: IBM thinks that over a billion new applications will be built with gen AI : Here’s how they’re going to help that happen with agentic AI
items.description: IBM details its plans to help enterprises to actually do more with AI, with an expanded set of agentic AI capabilities.

items.title: Meta, Cisco put open-source LLMs at the core of next-gen SOC workflows
items.description: Cisco’s Foundation-sec-8B LLM & Meta’s AI Defenders redefine cybersecurity with open-source AI for scalable SOCs.
